titles.title: To prohibit providing Federal funds for the National Endowment for the Arts.
To prohibit providing Federal funds for the National Endowment for the Arts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

term.name: National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities

bill.summary: Prohibits any federal funds from being made available to the National Endowment for the Arts.
